definition: pleasing the senses or mind aesthetically
sentence: The sunset over the mountains was truly beautiful.

definition: having a great deal of worldly experience and knowledge
sentence: Her sophisticated taste in fashion impressed everyone at the gala.
The intricate design of the jewelry made it a stunning piece.

definition: persistence in doing something despite difficulty or delay in achieving success
sentence: Her perseverance in studying for the exam paid off when she received a high score.

definition: competent or skilled in doing or using something
sentence: He is proficient in several languages, which helps in his career.

definition: open to more than one interpretation; having a double meaning
sentence: The instructions were ambiguous, leading to confusion among the participants.

definition: given to sudden and unaccountable changes of mood or behavior
sentence: The capricious weather made it hard to plan outdoor activities.

definition: happening by accident or chance rather than design
sentence: It was fortuitous that they met at the coffee shop just when they needed help.

definition: a typical example or pattern of something; a model
sentence: The new paradigm in education emphasizes collaboration and creativity.

definition: a person or thing that is the direct opposite of someone or something else
sentence: Her calm demeanor was the antithesis of his frantic energy.
